channel.title: Jpa on GitOrko
channel.description: Recent content in Jpa on GitOrko

item.title: Ticket Booking System
item.description: A Ticket Booking system developed with Spring Boot, Spring JPA, Redis and Angular (Clarity) frontend.

item.title: Spring - Angular
item.description: Spring Boot web application with angular and JWT authentication support, uses clarity for UI components and chart.js for rendering charts.

item.title: Spring - Thymeleaf
item.description: Spring Boot MVC application with Thymeleaf template & basic spring security support, uses bootstrap for CSS and chart.js for rendering charts.

item.title: Spring JPA N+1
item.description: The N+1 query problem occurs when the framework executes N additional SQL statements to fetch the same data that could have been retrieved when executing the primary SQL query.
